column4: i'm looking for some help with uninstalling Fedora 9 and installing linux
hello guys, can you please advise?
when I instert the windows CD, it doesn't boot

what happens is that when I try to boot from the windows CD, it tells me to "press any key to boot from CD" and I do. but then once it starts checking for hardware I can't seem to get to the pont where I can format the harddrives
from what i haave been reading on forums...it have to format the harddrive
but how do i format the harddrive fom the Fedora console..I'm a noob in linux?
you can use parted, its quite cool from the command line
are you using parted, fdisk, or gparted?
ah wait, you mean grub, just press return
alright, return will do the trick
nope, you will get GUI for everything
you see the gui in front of you now? or the command line?
goodie, basically everything should be pretty obvious now, you can just select which partitions you want to delete now and then resize the remaining partitions to fit in
